bibl.title: A Alexandria antiga refletida pelo olhar romano. [The Ancient Alexandria Reflected the Roman Look.]
bibl.note: Discusses how images associated to Alexandria's greatness and prosperity illustrate a perception of the city as a mirror to Rome and a threat to its hegemony. - Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Joana Campos Clímaco, A Alexandria antiga refletida pelo olhar romano. [The Ancient Alexandria Reflected the Roman Look.]
Romanitas. Revista de Estudos Grecolatinos 1 (2013) pp. 148-169.

Discusses how images associated to Alexandria's greatness and prosperity illustrate a perception of the city as a mirror to Rome and a threat to its hegemony. - Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais.
